pages.text:
Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
Corporate Events
Whether you’re planning a team-building event, a company outing, or a client appreciation party, Kings provides the perfect environment for your next corporate event. Beyond bowling, Kings features high tech arcades, pool tables, and state of the art AV equipment to personalize your event.
The Games
THIS IS WHERE IT GETS FUN!
There is no better feeling than beating your boss in a round of bowling, or beating their high score in the arcade, or taking them down on the billiards tables. Really...we can’t think of a better way to boost team morale.
Make your event uniquely yours! Connect with our Event Manager to start customizing your experience—including exclusive Kings-themed
invitations tailored just for you.
Create a Custom Evite
Custom Menus
Boring Food? Not Here!
Treat your guests to a wide range of menu options, from crowd pleasing appetizers and gourmet entrees to custom-designed menus. Our amazing sales team will help you curate a menu fit for your guests.
View Menu
Bar Packages
A LITTLE SOMETHING TO TAKE THE EDGE OFF.
This is more than your average “drinks after work.” With custom bar packages featuring beer, wine, and our creative cocktails or mocktails, there is something for everyone.
Start Planning
Make your event uniquely yours! Connect with our Event Manager to start customizing your experience—including exclusive Kings-themed
invitations tailored just for you.
Create a Custom Evite

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
About Us
At Kings we...
Offer elevated bowling, arcades, gaming and entertainment in a sleek retro environment. For over 20 years friends, families and co-workers have enjoyed our craveable crowd-pleasing food, creative cocktails and extensive beer selection alongside bowling, billiards, arcades and countless big screens.
Known for our ability to cater to private events of all shapes and sizes, guests return over and again for unforgettable corporate outings, birthday parties, family gatherings and more.
Our dedicated team is guest-obsessed and passionate about connecting with our community.
At Kings, we invite you to Rule the Night.
Recruit, develop & empower a talented and motivated team
Provide the premier social gaming and entertainment experience.
Create an unmatched dining experience by delivering the highest quality food and beverage.
Serve our community and support its effort in helping others

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
Bowling
All Kings locations feature 10-pin bowling lanes with high tech interactive bowling games and themed animations. Try your hand at your classic bowling, level up with one of the Mad Games, or customize your experience with  selfies taken right at the bowler console. The options are truly endless.
Bowling pricing varies by location and time of day find your location to learn more!
Find a Location
Classic Games
Classic & Skill Games include games like:
Low Ball:
In "Low Ball" bowlers try to knock down the least amount of pins possible. However, you must knock down at least one pin on each shot. If you throw a gutter on the first ball, you get a strike. Likewise, if you throw a gutter, or get no pins on your second ball, you receive a spare for that frame. Perfect game in "Low Ball" is a score of 20.
Odd & Duck:
The player must bowl an odd number of pins, and not a strike. If the player knocks down an odd number of pins, the score is normally recorded. If the player knocks down an even number of pins or a strike or a gutter, the score will be zero.
Last Pin Standing
- The aim is to knock down as many pins as you can without hitting the head pin. To get a strike, hit all pins EXCEPT the head pin with the first shot! If you hit the head pin with your first shot, the frame is over and your score is zero! If you hit all pins but the head pin with the second shot, you get a spare. Max score is 300.
Mad Games
Mad Games are fun for all ages! You can bowl in a way that is easier to understand, faster to finish, and fun for all skill levels. Now you don't have to knock down the most pins to be a WINNER! Some of these games are:
Battle on the Lanes:
Battle on the Lanes - Destroy the castle of the opposing player/team and you win! Play lane vs. lane or team vs. team. The number of pins you knock down determines the stones thrown and the amount of damage done to the opponents. The more the bowler is expert, the less his stone is powerful. The available skill levels are Easy, Medium, Hard, and Expert.
Character Factory:
The aim of the game is to create an avatar. Starting from a neutral model, the different parts of the character (body, legs, arms, head, pet) will be customized after each frame (5 frames/5 changes). At the end of the game, all the characters are displayed together.
Bowling FAQ
Do you have candle pin bowling?
While we do not have candle pin lanes, all Kings locations have 10-pin bowling lanes with a variety of ball weights for kids and adults.
What is the price bowl?
Bowling is charged per person per hour. To see pricing at your local Kings, click the Bowling & Games section on their location page. Find your location
here.
How many guests can fit on a lane?
Each lane can fit up to 6 guests.
Do you have bumpers?
Yes, all lanes have bumpers.
Are food and drinks available while bowling?
Yes, full-service dining is available at all lanes.
Am I required to purchase/wear bowling shoes?
For your safety bowling shoes must be worn while bowling. However, if you choose to bring your own shoes you are not required to rent from Kings.  Shoe rental is $3 per pair.
Can I bring my own bowling shoes and bowling ball?
Guests can bring their own bowling balls, shoes or any bowling gear they desire. Kings is not responsible for damage to any guests' belongings.
Are walk-ins allowed?
Yes, reservations are not required, and walk-ins are always welcome.
Are all Kings locations wheelchair and ADA accessible?
Yes, Kings is fully wheelchair and ADA accessible, including ramps, wide entrances, and accessible restrooms. We strive to provide a welcoming and inclusive environment for everyone.

Main content starts here, tab to start navigating
Birthday Parties & Social Events
Looking to throw an unforgettable birthday party, bachelor/bachelorette party, or other social event? Look no further. With social gaming, bowling, arcades, creative cocktails, and crowd-pleasing menus Kings has everything you need.
The Games
THIS IS WHERE IT GETS FUN!
Whether you’re planning a party for yourself or for a loved one, Kings is always the right answer. With bowling, billiards, arcade games, and more, it will be a celebration to remember.
Make your event uniquely yours! Connect with our Event Manager to start customizing your experience—including exclusive Kings-themed
invitations tailored just for you.
Create a Custom Evite
Custom Menus
BORING FOOD? NOT HERE.
Treat your guests to a wide range of menu options, from crowd pleasing appetizers and gourmet entrees to custom-designed menus. Our amazing sales team will help you curate a menu fit for your celebration.
View Menu
Creative Cocktails
It wouldn’t be a party with out it!
Every good party starts with cocktails. With custom bar packages featuring beer, wine, and our creative cocktails or mocktails, there is something for everyone.
Start Planning
Make your event uniquely yours! Connect with our Event Manager to start customizing your experience—including exclusive Kings-themed
invitations tailored just for you.
